goal: My sister is considering a move to Charlotte, North Carolina and we're curious about the high-end market. On Zilloft, find the single most expensive 4+ bedroom house currently available for rent. Once you find it, schedule a one-hour video call with 'maria.g@gomail.com' for this Tuesday at 7 PM on my GoCalendar. Title the event 'Look at this wild house in Charlotte!' and paste the Zilloft property link into the event description.

evals.description: Verify that a new calendar event was successfully created.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that the calendar event's title is 'Look at this wild house in Charlotte!'.
evals.query: contains(gocalendar.differences.events.added.values(@)[0].title, 'Look at this wild house in Charlotte!')
